answers.answer: it improved 2/3... the doctor thinks diabetes can improve eyesight but then it will get worse... i'm in perfect health... why would it  improve so much?
What improved?  2/3 does not mean anything to me.Dr. O.

At my eye exam the doctor said that my eyesight had improved drasticlally.  I knew my current prescription was not right.  What i'm seeing at now at 100 feet i was seeing at only at 30.  they said when it get better like that it usually then gets worse.  they asked about my health, diabetes etc.  I'm in good health, work out regularly, had a complete blood work up in April and all was well.   should i be concerned?  I will get my old prescription and current one and include it in future comments.
They also said that i would not be a candidate for Lasik because my eyes are changing.

question: why would my eyesight improve radically.
title: eye improvement
